ARTICLE.TITLE: Give! launches 2020 fundraising campaign
ARTICLE.TEXT:
Applications open March 16 for nonprofits to be part of the 2020 Give! Campaign.

The campaign, a philanthropic initiative of the Colorado Publishing House, is hosting three information sessions for nonprofits to learn how to be part of the 2020 fundraising effort:

• Thursday, March 26: 3:30-5 p.m. at the Rockrimmon Library, 832 Village Center Drive

• Friday, April 2: 5:30-7 p.m. at Penrose Library, 20 N. Cascade Ave.

• Tuesday, April 7: 3:30-5 p.m. at the Sand Creek Library, 1821 South Academy Blvd.

Applications are due by April 17 and can be submitted at indygive.com/application.

More information about applying can be found here.

Give! was created to encourage everyone in the Pikes Peak region to give back and get involved with local nonprofits, with a particular emphasis on catalyzing philanthropy among those 36 and younger.

- Advertisement -

Since 2009, Give! has enabled 223 local nonprofits to raise $13 million from more than 94,000 donations while helping them access matching grants, media exposure and capacity-building training from local and regional experts.

Last year alone, the campaign raised more than $1.6 million for 100 local nonprofits.

Give! receives support from the Colorado Springs Independent, Colorado Springs Business Journal, the Southeast Express and the Pikes Peak Bulletin. For more information, visit indygive.com.
